body: Actually, the size of characters in a generally mono-spaced environment is independent of font and well-defined. There are half-width characters that occupy one column and full-width characters that occupy two columns. See [this report](http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr11/) for details. Issue #8273 mentions some strategies to implement. The corresponding tables aren't that large either as full-width characters appear in long, uninterrupted blocks.
